root.name: NoLimits Roller Coaster Simulation
root.description: As of Update 1.7, No Limits features the following track styles: Mine-train (with without locomotive)Trailered wooden (2 seat car)Trailered wooden (4 seat car)Classic wooden (4 seat car)Classic wooden (6 seat car)LIM launchedGerstlauer Euro-FighterGerstlauer Euro-Fighter 2Vekoma MotorbikeCorkscrewHyper (2 seat row)Inverted (4 seat row)Classic loopingModern loopingFace-to-face invertedImpulse invertedTwisted steel loopingStandupInverted (2 seat row)FloorlessHyper (4 seat row)Flying DutchmanGerstlauer Spinning CoasterMaurer Söhne Spinning CoasterGerstlauer Bobsled Coaster
